name: get_urls_from_google_query
summary: Obtains a list of URLs corresponding to Google's search results for a given query.
description: This function enables the automation of Google search results retrieval, particularly useful in building systems that need to analyze web content in response to diverse search queries.

args.name: search_query
args.description: The search query to be submitted to Google.

return_value.description: A list of URLs returned from the Google search corresponding to the search query. In case of an error, the function returns a list containing a single string that details the error.
